    • Method Detail

      • addSMPAccount

        public java.lang.String addSMPAccount(long userId,
                             java.lang.String network,
                             java.lang.String redirectUrl)
        Description copied from interface: SMPAccountAPI
        Connects user's Social Media account to his/her profile.

        Authorization Flow
        1. Send a request to /rest/padgetsuser/{uid}/smp/add with all parameters
        2. Use a URL returned by the response to redirect the user
        3. Wait while user is authorizing PADGETS platform
        4. After successful authorization Application Server redirects user to the page specified in redirectURL parameter
        Specified by:
        addSMPAccount in interface SMPAccountAPI
        Parameters:
        userId - user id
        network - name of the Social Media Platform ("facebook", "twitter", "blogger")
        Returns:
        a URL which is used by Front End to direct the user to authentication page

      • removeSMPAccount

        Description copied from interface: SMPAccountAPI
        Disconnects/removes Social Media account from user's Padgets account
        Specified by:
